species.name: garbodor
descriptions: Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots from its right arm. If even a little of it gets on you, you’ll experience the effects of the unidentified toxin.
Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
For a time, their numbers increased explosively in Alola. Since the arrival of Grimer, their population has decreased dramatically.
It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
It locks opponents in place with its left hand, immobilizing them by entirely dousing their bodies with poisonous liquid.

abilities.name: stench
abilities.effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

abilities.name: aftermath
abilities.effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.
